overview: The Rainbow Cursor is a Hardmode vanity accessory that drops from the Empress of Light with a 1/20 (5%) chance. It causes the player's cursor to continuously change colors.
notes: The accessory will only be active while in a world, not in the main menu.
tips: Because vanity accessories such as the Rainbow Cursor cannot be reforged to grant any benefits besides appearance, it is recommended to equip them in the player's social accessory slots.
title: Rainbow Cursor
tooltip: Causes your mouse cursor to have shifting rainbow colors
